title: Huge amount of bots in ARAM
body:
Constantly coming across bots in ARAM recently. They're also far worse at playing than bots used to be. 

Please Riot, for the love of god help us. We're drowning in bots. I've had to report a bot in almost every game for the past few weeks. It's ruining this game for everyone!

replies.body: I fear that riot is allowing a nominal amount of bots to keep the 'concurrent users' at an all time high. I come across bots in ARAM & Treeline of all places... I feel your pain... Report them for Cheating/3rd Party. But don't hold your breath. Bots give them concurrent user stats that they crave.
